treatment.description: Plants usually with rhizomes or crowns, sometimes enlarging by offsets from stem/caudex bases. Leaves linear-oblanceolate to oblanceolate or narrowly spatulate; (2–)3–16 × 2–14 mm, bases not persistent. Involucres 4.5–7.5 mm.

key_statement.statement: Basal leaves linear-oblanceolate to narrowly spatulate, (5–)8–16(–22) × 2–5 mm; involucres 6–7.5 mm; florets 4–5 mm; flowering Oct–May
Basal leaves narrowly oblanceolate, (2–)3–8 × (4–)5–14 mm; involucres 4.5–6 mm; florets 3–4 mm; flow-ering Aug–Nov
